Tables: Changed several caching behaviors with regards to the global table filter, sort state and scroll position
When filtering by a number column, the table should now yield accurate results for negative values when a range is set
Several other minor bug fixes and improvements

Emailing: Major improvements have been made to the email editor
Bulk emailing is now enabled for employees
Customizable email signatures can be added emails
Settlements: A new set of pages has been added to manage settlements
Employees: The settlement code now links directly to its "Settlement View" page
The selected "View Mode" will now be cached and will persist through navigations

Emailing: Major improvements have been made to the email editor
Customizable email signatures can be added emails

Several other minor bug fixes and improvements
